t.p:
You have successfully signed up.
Your account is in review and we will get back to you soon.

figcaption.p: Industrylane is in partnership with manufacturers or biggest distributor assigned by the manufacturers to ensure 100% genuine and authentic products for customers.
Industrylane’s digitized catalogue allows streamlining of your entire procurement. Imagine having all products in place. No more calling hundreds of vendors for pricing.
Exclusive Store fronts for all customers. Customized store front for each customer, with customer specific products only. We show you only products that you are interested in buying.

Industrylane’s smart basket feature, simplifies your life. There is no need to request for a quote every time. We create your own custom catalogue based on your consumptions, and we fix rates for a period of time, thereby guaranteeing you additional cost savings.

blockquote.p: Industrylane is a trusted supplier. Best prices and products with amazing delivery services by experts/ technician.

We are really satisfied with the services from Industrylane team.Providing the right materials in the right time has reduced our purchasing lead time, phone calls etc.This has also reduced lot of paper work.
blockquote.div: Purchase Manager, JPT Electronic Systems Pvt Ltd.

blockquote.p: We hereby appreciate the services of M/S Industrylane in providing industrial consumables on right time with reasonable pricing from renowned sources. This has reduced our burden on searching for commodities , lead time for supply etc. Kindly keep up your good work in coming days.

Industry Lane Solutions Pvt Ltd has been proved incredible asset to our business within a short span. This start-up multi-brand store saves us a lot of time and cost. They are awesome to work with, Incredibly organized, truly professional, easy to communicate, responsive with next iterations. I strongly recommend others to get associated with them.
blockquote.div: Senior Manager Purchase, Nash Industries, Peenya.

blockquote.p: We have been working with Industrylane for quite some time and their products have always been of excellent quality and cost effective. Their understanding of our unique business needs enables them to provide us best quality products at most competitive prices. Industrylane has always been professional, honest, focused & reliable and I would not hesitate in recommending Industrylane to anyone.
In continuation with your great support in delivering industrial Consumables items, we place your excellent services on record and we request you to keep up your good work in future.

figcaption.p: Industrylane ensures that you will get the best price for the product. We believe in serving our customers with utmost integrity and honesty and provide end to end transparency in your procurement.
Industrylane’s digitized catalogue allows streamlining of your entire procurement. Imagine having all products in place. No more calling hundreds of vendors for pricing.

At Industrylane, a lot of emphasis is given on quality of products we procure. Our robust and stringent vendor enrollment procedures ensures that we only supply genuine products. Out of every 15 potential vendors we evaluate, only 1 qualifies.

Industrylane ensures that all manufacturer’s warranty/ guarantee is passed on to our end customers. In the unfortunate scenario of where a product supplied develops an issue, Industrylane’s customer service agents will assist you through the entire process of a repair/ refund or replacement.
Stock only what you need, and the rest is our headache. We help optimize your warehouse inventory levels, thereby clearing up space for other activities.

div.h4: Welcome to Industrylane’s Supplier registration page. We would like to thank you for showing interest in doing business with us. If you are a product manufacturer interested in distributions, or if you are a seller of goods or services, request you to fill out the below form and we will revert back to you shortly. We will keep your profile in our database. Our product managers use the database and evaluate if there is a business opportunity with your company.

div.h4: Welcome to Industrylane’s Supplier registration page. We would like to thank you for showing interest in doing business with us. If you are a product manufacturer interested in distributions, or if you are a seller of goods or services, request you to fill out the below form and we will revert back to you shortly. We will keep your profile in our database. Our product managers use the database and evaluate if there is a business opportunity with your company.

div.h3: We’re here to to simplify your life in two important ways:

ul.li: Being able to buy what you need, when you need
Optimum space utilization in the warehouse
Build a reliable and trusting supply chain

div.p: Industrylane (Industrylane Solutions Pvt Ltd) is a one stop shop solution for all industrial consumable purchases such as MRO, cutting tools, measuring instruments, fasteners, safety equipments etc., among other product categories.
We at Industrylane believe in true partnerships because we understand that you’re short on time to work around the several challenges that’s associated with industrial consumable purchases.

div.h2: "Industrylane strives to create solutions for our customers that can add real value. Creating a platform for honest , integral and best in class services, Industrylane and its team will simplify your life for you”

div.h3: The team at Industrylane has professionals who are leading change and driving the performance and growth of the organization. Academic qualifications that range from management, engineering, marketing and data analytics, combined with a rich experience in the industry. We value a transparent work environment. Open communication and honest dialogue are part of our work ethic. The contributions of all employees are valued. All the differences that define each of us as unique individuals are encompassed in the diversity of the workplace. Our professionals are constantly meeting the exciting challenges of delivering service solutions that consistently exceed industry standards.

As a rapidly growing company, working to solve customers' problems, with innovative solutions in a fast paced and exciting environment. Industrylane is constantly looking for exceptional talent to join hands with us in our quest to empower our customers in a competitive marketplace. If you feel you have the skills to make a difference to our effort, do mail your resume to careers@industrylane.com .Our Recruitment Manager will get back to you when a suitable requirement arises within the organization.
